name: n8n
tagline: A self-hosted workflow automation platform with node-based editing
description: n8n is a workflow automation platform and alternative to Zapier, enabling self-hosted automations with node-based editing. It offers integrations, triggers, custom code, and an extensible runtime.

features.title: Workflow Automation
features.description: Build automated workflows connecting apps and services

features.title: Visual Workflow Editor
features.description: Design workflows using a visual editor

features.title: App Integrations
features.description: Connect to a wide range of third-party services

features.title: Trigger-Based Execution
features.description: Run workflows based on events or schedules

features.title: Data Transformation
features.description: Transform and map data between workflow steps

features.title: Execution History
features.description: View past workflow runs and logs

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the automation platform on your own infrastructure
